title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite ;Machine Tool and MachiningProbability and Statistics;Product Tolerances, Tolerance Analysis and Allocation.Process CapabilityStatistical Process control, Economics of quality Control.Acceptance Sampling Plans and selection.Taguchi Techniques.Product Reliability, Reliability Achievement, Reliability Testing, Reliability Evaluation.System Reliability Assessment.Quality Circles, ISO9000,Quality Awards.
